org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

Class BwProvisioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners.BwProvisioner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BwProvisionerSimple

    public abstract class BwProvisioner
extends java.lang.Object
    BwProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of bandwidth to virtual machines inside a Host. When extending this class, care must be taken to guarantee that the field availableBw will always contain the amount of free bandwidth available for future allocations.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
